It is a shrub or small tree that can grow up to 3 meters in height, characterized by its hairy stems and broad, heart-shaped leaves. Its fibrous bark and soft, fuzzy texture make it a popular ornamental plant in gardens. Abutilon rufinerve thrives in warm, humid climates and requires well-drained soil for optimal growth.
